type: Maintenance of the explosion protection system
short_summary: The department is seeking maintenance services for the atomizer dryer's explosion protection system.
description: The department is seeking maintenance services for the atomizer dryer's explosion protection system to ensure it is working as intended. The services will be delivered to AAFC Research and Development Centre in St Hyacinthe.
full_summary:
# Maintenance of the Explosive Protection System

### Reference and Solicitation Number

> **PW-22-01009630**     |     **01B46-22-114**

### Solicitation Information

*   **Title (En/Fr)**: Maintenance of the Explosion Protection System / Entretien du système de protection contre les explosions
*   **Publication Date**: 2022-10-11
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-10-28 14:00:00     |     *Expired*
*   **GSIN Code/Description**: *N6665BB     |     DETECTORS, HAZARD, EXPLOSIVES*

### Tender Description

Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada intends to award a contract for the maintenance of the explosive protection system for the atomizer dryer's (AAFC Research and Development Centre in St Hyacinthe, 3600 Casavant Boulevard West, Saint Hyacinthe, PQ, J2S 8E3). The contract will be for a term of five (5) years with possible extensions of five (5) years.

To submit an application, please use the following proposals and supporting documents documentation:

downloadable documents can be accessed from the link:

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/19/2506d117e9bbbb7cbb547c6860ccb2bc/amend1_en_22-114.pdf

https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/19/fa70e6a9e0e1c12641830df7cf0a851d/final_rfp_22-114.pdf

Application submission will be processed on a fair, open, and transparent basis. AAFC uses technology to reduce costs and make information more accessible and encourage participation by Persons with Disabilities and Accessibility services.

- Notice Author: Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada
- Contact Information:
	*	    Mireille Paquette     |     e-mail: mireille.paquette2@agr.gc.ca     |
